messages.subject: conversation with 3 year old
messages.msgSnippet: I was telling Logan a few minutes ago that he could go back to wearing underpants since our clothes dryer will be delivered tomorrow. I suggested he go ahead
messages.messageBody:
I was telling Logan a few minutes ago that he could go back to wearing underpants since our clothes dryer will be delivered tomorrow. I suggested he go ahead and take off his wet diaper and put some on. I'm talking to him, and he walks away...I said "Logan, are you ignoring me?" and he said "Yes I AM!"

All I could do was laugh..he did go and get underpants by the way....

MamaBeth


Everything I need to know, I learned on my own!
